Package com.haru.task

Haru SDK 내부에서 사용되는 패키지입니다.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Continuation<TTaskResult,TContinuationResult>
    A function to be called after a task completes.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Capture<T>
    Provides a class that can be used for capturing variables containedIn an anonymous class implementation.
    Task<TResult>
    Represents the result of an asynchronous operation.
    TaskQueue
    Simple Task queue for queing multiple tasks.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    AggregateException
    Aggregates Exceptions that may be thrown containedIn the process of a task's execution.

Package com.haru.task Description

Haru SDK 내부에서 사용되는 패키지입니다. 개발자를 위한 목적이 아니며, 향후 동의없이 제거될 수 있습니다.
